Flow.description: Change get value from account to from CTR header 20/05/2024 | Convert Picklist API Name to Label Name in Screen 24/05/2024 | Add field Sub district and contact person section 01/07/2024 | Add Display Text For Ship-to Name Local = Null or Blank

formulas.name: AccountAssignmentGroup
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.AccountAssignmentGroup__c}, "01","01 Domestic Revenues", "02","02 Foreign Revenues", "03","03 Affiliate Comp Revenues", "04","Business Area Revenues","-")

formulas.name: DeliveryPlant
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.DeliveryPlant__c}, "A000","A000 : Head Off", "A010","A010 : Cen.Tmn", "A020","A020 : SAKC.", "A0Y0","A0Y0 : Custody", "A0Z0","A0Z0 : PFR1", "A0Z1","A0Z1 : PFR2", "H100","H100 : TSV Head Off", "H110","H110 : TSV-Go Dau", "H120","H120 : TSV-Container Long Thanh", "H130","H130 : TSV-Bac Ninh", "H1Z0","H1Z0 : TSV-3rd Party (South)", "H210","H210 : TSV-Hai phong", "H220","H220 : Bac Ninh2", "H2Z0","H2Z0 : TSV 3rd party (North)","-")

formulas.name: DistributionChannel
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.DistributionChannel__c}, "10","10-Domestic Major Oil", "11","11-Domestic Third Party", "12","12-Domestic TOP Group", "13","13-Domestic Other", "14","14-Domestic User/Blnder", "15","15-Domestic Trade/Resel", "16","16-Domestic", "17","17-Free Tax Zone", "20","20-Export Direct", "21","21-Export Indirect", "22","22-Export Free Zone", "23","23-Exp Direct Trading", "24","24-Exp Indirect Trading", "25","25-Export", "26","26-Export Direct Broker", "30","30-Import (VAT)", "31","31-Import Indirect(VAT)", "32","32-Import (Non-VAT)", "33","33-Import Indirect(Non-VAT)", "IC","IC-Intra-comp. Transfer","-")

formulas.name: Division
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.Division__c}, "00","00-Cross Division", "01","01", "10","10-Crude / Feedstock", "11","11-Ole", "20","20-Light Distillate", "21","21-Middle Distillate", "22","22-Heavy Distillate", "23","23-Fuels Additive", "29","29-Other (TOP)", "30","30-Aromatics", "39","39-Other (TPX)", "40","40-Lube Base Group I", "41","41-Lube Base Group II", "42","42-Lube Base Group III", "43","43-Bitumen", "44","44-Specialty", "49","49-Other (TLB)", "50","50-Hydrocarbon Solvent", "51","51-Other Chemicals&Lube", "52","52-Chemical Solvent", "53","53-Petroleum", "59","59-Olefins & Polymer", "60","60-LAB", "69","69-Other (LAB)", "70","70-Olefin", "80","80-Hydrocarbon Services", "90","90-Non Hydrocarbon","-")

formulas.name: PartialDeliveriesPerItem
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.PartialDeliveriesperitem__c}, "A","A: Create a delivery with qty greater than zero", "B","B: Create only one delivery (also with quantity = 0)", "C","C: Only complete delivery allowed", "D","D: No limit to subsequent deliveries","-")

formulas.name: SalesDistrict
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.SalesDistrict__c}, "000001","Northern region", "000002","Southern region", "CENTRE","Lower North Island", "NORTH","Upper North Island", "SOUTH","South Island", "ZTH001","TH_Central", "ZTH002","TH_Northern", "ZTH003","TH_Northeastern", "ZTH004","TH_Eastern", "ZTH005","TH_Southern", "ZTH006","TH_Western", "ZTH0EX","TH_Export", "ZTHOTH","TH_Other Country", "ZVN001","VN_North", "ZVN002","VN_South", "ZVN0EX","VN_Export", "ZID001","ID_JKT", "ZID002","ID_Jawa", "ZID003","ID_Sumatera", "ZID004","ID_Kalimantan", "ZID005","ID_Sulawesi", "ZSG001","SG_Central","-")

formulas.name: SalesOrgTX
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.SalesOrganizationTX__c}, "2000","2000-TOP NEXT International Company Limited", "9100","9100-TOP SOLVENT VIETNAM", "9200","9200-PT.TIRTA SURYA RAYA", "9300","9300-JSKem Pte Ltd", "9400","9400-TSChem","-")

formulas.name: ShippingCondition
formulas.expression: CASE({!GetRequestItemRecord.ShippingConditions__c}, "01","01 : As Soon As Possible", "02","02 : Standard", "90","90 : Company Delivery", "91","91 : Own Pickup Pack", "92 ","92 : Own Pickup Bulk", "93","93 : Transport 3rd Pack", "94","94 : Transport 3rd Bulk", "95","95 : Return", "99","99 : Others", "GN","GN : Non-Hydrocarbon", "LO","LO : Lorry", "PI","PI : Pipeline", "SB","SB : Ship-Bulk", "SH","SH : Ship", "SI","SI : Ship-Isotank/Cont.", "SV","SV : Service", "SW ","SW : Swap", "TH","TH : Thappline", "TK","TK : Tank", "UR","UR : Urgent","-")

formulas.name: TaxClassification
formulas.expression: CASE({!getRequestHeader.TAXClassification__c}, "0","0 : Tax Excempt", "1","1 : Liable for Taxes", "2","2 : Free Tax Zone", "3","3 : Non Tax","-")

Flow.label: CTR Ship-to Record Screen Detail
